descriptionHTML:
Focus timer is the ultimate time management application for your Android Wear smartwatches

Focus timer is inspired by Pomodoro™ technique that boosts productivity by breaking down work periods into 25 minute slices, separated by short brakes.

Transform your Android Wear smart watch into this awesome productivity booster.

In this version:

★ Beautiful strawberry timer,
★ Start and reset buttons.
★ Haptic feedback.
★ Statistics and settings

and more.

Pomodoro™ and Pomodoro Technique® are registered trademarks of Francesco Cirillo. This app is not affiliated with Francesco Cirillo.
comments: Like it I like that the app on the phone. Could be better looking for sure. The calendar sometimes doesn't show.
Battery hog. Never dims the screen when running.
Works on 360 now I'd like to see it display the time left without having to launch the app and less battery drain though
This pomodoro timer works really well I especially like that it does not drain battery too much
Without the doubt the best Pomodoro timer
Incompatible with Moto 360 Version 1.0 is not compatible with the Moto 360.
